content: little tannenbaum the little tannenbaum ornament is a simple conifer-shaped holiday decoration that is spruced up with little buttons these are super quick to knit up and are really cute decorative ornaments for the holiday season materials stitch abbreviation key ◦ approximately 15m 16 yds of worsted-weight k knit yarn st s stitch es ◦ 3 5mm us size 4 needles or size needed for r s right side ws wrong side firm gauge k2tog knit 2 together ssk slip slip knit ◦yarn needle c dd center double decrease slip 2 sts from the ◦buttons approx 5-8 le ft needle to the right needle as if to k2tog knit the n ext st on the left needle insert the left needle into th e two slipped stitches and pull them both over the finished height of the ornament is approximately kn it stitch removing them from the right needle 4-5 10-12cm tall depending on how tightly you knit g arter stitch knit all sts on all row 1 ©2019 alexandria wenninger wee ewe knits directions cast on 5 sts using the long-tail cast-on work in garter stitch for 6 row at the end of the 6th row cast on 8 sts using the backwards loop cast on turn knit to the end and cast on an additional 8 sts using the backwards loop cast-on turn work 2 row in garter stitch ~~~ decrease sequence row 1 ws k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 row 2-4 knit all sts work the above decrease sequence a total of 8 times 5 sts remain ~~~ ws k1 cdd k1 rs k all sts ws cdd cut yarn leaving a tail long enough to make a loop to hang the ornament weave in ends and use a bit of yarn to sew on the buttons note if your yarn is plied you may wish to separate some of the plies to thin the yarn if your buttonholes are small enjoy 2 ©2019 alexandria wenninger wee ewe knits
